1.title: Safety Checks

2.title: Successful Interactions

3.title: Professional Tone

4.title: Compliance Issues

5.title: PII detected

6.title: Recent prompts
6.query:
fetch spans
| search "safety"
//| filter isNotNull(safety.blocked)
| fields end_time, query.text, agent.type, safety.passed_all_checks, interaction.successful, tone.professional, compliance.issues_detected, compliance.issues, safety.on_topic, accuracy.contains_correct_phone, safety.risk_level, safety.inappropriate_content, safety.pii_detected, retrieval.docs_found, safety.violation_type, retrieval.success
| sort end_time desc

8.title: Fraud Attempt
8.query:
fetch spans
| search "safety"
//| fields query.text, agent.type, safety.passed_all_checks, interaction.successful, tone.professional, compliance.issues_detected, compliance.issues, safety.on_topic, accuracy.contains_correct_phone, safety.risk_level, safety.inappropriate_content, safety.pii_detected, retrieval.docs_found, safety.violation_type, retrieval.success
| fields safety.violation_type
| summarize count = count(), by:{safety.violation_type}
| filter isNotNull(safety.violation_type)
| filter safety.violation_type == "fraud_attempt"

9.title: PII exposure
9.query:
fetch spans
| search "safety"
//| fields query.text, agent.type, safety.passed_all_checks, interaction.successful, tone.professional, compliance.issues_detected, compliance.issues, safety.on_topic, accuracy.contains_correct_phone, safety.risk_level, safety.inappropriate_content, safety.pii_detected, retrieval.docs_found, safety.violation_type, retrieval.success
| fields safety.violation_type
| summarize count = count(), by:{safety.violation_type}
| filter isNotNull(safety.violation_type)
| filter safety.violation_type == "pii_exposure"

10.title: Fraud Attempt
10.query:
fetch spans
| filter isNotNull(safety.blocked)
| fields end_time, query.text, agent.type, safety.passed_all_checks, interaction.successful, tone.professional, compliance.issues_detected, compliance.issues, safety.on_topic, accuracy.contains_correct_phone, safety.risk_level, safety.inappropriate_content, safety.pii_detected, retrieval.docs_found, safety.violation_type, retrieval.success
| sort end_time desc
| filter safety.risk_level == "critical"
| fields end_time, query.text, agent.type, safety.risk_level, safety.violation_type

11.query:
fetch spans
| filter dt.openpipeline.source == "/api/v2/otlp/v1/traces"
| sort end_time desc

| summarize count = count(), by:{traceloop.entity.name}

12.title: Off Topic chats
12.query:
fetch spans
| search "safety"
//| fields query.text, agent.type, safety.passed_all_checks, interaction.successful, tone.professional, compliance.issues_detected, compliance.issues, safety.on_topic, accuracy.contains_correct_phone, safety.risk_level, safety.inappropriate_content, safety.pii_detected, retrieval.docs_found, safety.violation_type, retrieval.success
| fields safety.violation_type
| summarize count = count(), by:{safety.violation_type}
| filter isNotNull(safety.violation_type)
| filter safety.violation_type == "off_topic"

13.title: PII Exposure
13.query:
fetch spans
| search "safety"
//| filter isNotNull(safety.blocked)
| fields end_time, query.text, agent.type, safety.passed_all_checks, interaction.successful, tone.professional, compliance.issues_detected, compliance.issues, safety.on_topic, accuracy.contains_correct_phone, safety.risk_level, safety.inappropriate_content, safety.pii_detected, retrieval.docs_found, safety.violation_type, retrieval.success
| sort end_time desc
| filter safety.violation_type == "pii_exposure"

14.title: Off Topic - Outside insurance
14.query:
fetch spans
| search "safety"
//| filter isNotNull(safety.blocked)
| fields end_time, query.text, agent.type, safety.passed_all_checks, interaction.successful, tone.professional, compliance.issues_detected, compliance.issues, safety.on_topic, accuracy.contains_correct_phone, safety.risk_level, safety.inappropriate_content, safety.pii_detected, retrieval.docs_found, safety.violation_type, retrieval.success
| sort end_time desc
| filter safety.violation_type == "off_topic"

15.title: On Topic - Outside insurance
15.query:
fetch spans
| search "safety"
//| filter isNotNull(safety.blocked)
| fields end_time, query.text, agent.type, safety.passed_all_checks, interaction.successful, tone.professional, compliance.issues_detected, compliance.issues, safety.on_topic, accuracy.contains_correct_phone, safety.risk_level, safety.inappropriate_content, safety.pii_detected, retrieval.docs_found, safety.violation_type, retrieval.success
| sort end_time desc
| filterOut safety.violation_type == "off_topic" 
| filterOut safety.risk_level == "critical"
